```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tseries)
library(ggpubr)
library(forecast)
set.seed(2022)
```



```{r}
ggAcf(btc2$diffe,type = "correlation",lag.max = 50)+labs(title = "bitcoin")
ggAcf(ada2$diffe,type = "correlation")+labs(title = "Cardano")
```




```{r}
btc_ar <- arima(btc2$diffe , order = c(1,0,5))

summary(btc_ar)

re<-residuals(btc_ar)


fit <- btc2$diffe-re

ts.plot(btc2$diffe)*points(fit, type = "l", col = 2, lty = 2)

```

```{r}
acf(re)


```
